name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restream Studio Controls for Stream Deck

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial extension that controls Restream Studio with an Elgato Stream Deck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control Restream Studio with an Elgato Stream Deck.

This extension requires additional setup. Check out the project home page for instructions: https://github.com/pozil/restream-chrome-extension
